text: Layered architecture separating routing, business logic and persistence for clarity.
note: Established service/persistence layers and modular routes for routing/business logic separation.

text: Domain models for inventory, leads, customers, service tickets and finance offers.
note: Introduced explicit domain models and persisted datasets for customers, service tickets, and finance offers alongside inventory and leads.

text: Clear API versioning strategy (e.g. `/v1`, `/v2`) to support breaking changes.
note: Confirmed versioned routing via /v1 with shared router wiring for future versions.

text: Centralized validation layer with reusable schemas for every endpoint.
note: Added schema-driven validation middleware and reusable request schemas across endpoints.

text: Strong typing via TypeScript or a schema-first tool like OpenAPI or Zod.
note: Adopted zodLite schema definitions to enforce typed payloads and queries for all routes.

text: Consistent error-handling middleware with machine-readable error codes.
note: Introduced centralized AppError handler emitting machine-readable codes with request ids.

text: Request correlation IDs for tracing complex user journeys across services.
note: Request correlation ids now flow through responses, audits, and error logs for tracing.

text: Structured JSON logging with log levels and request context metadata.
note: Structured JSON request/response logging with log levels and context metadata.

text: Configurable rate limiting to protect public endpoints from abuse.
note: Rate limiter now surfaces standardized error codes using existing configurable window and max settings.

text: Built-in JWT or OAuth2 authentication with refresh token rotation.
note: Implemented JWT login/refresh/logout endpoints with rotating refresh tokens and bearer auth enforcement.

text: Role-based access control with granular permissions per resource.
note: Enforced role-based permissions across protected routes with seeded admin/sales/marketing accounts.

text: Multi-tenancy support for multi-location dealership groups.
note: Added tenant resolution middleware, tenant-aware auth tokens, per-tenant filtering/persistence, and seed tenants.

text: Environment-based configuration management with secrets stored securely.
note: Centralized configuration module with .env example covering auth, tenancy, rate limits, and HTTPS settings.

text: HTTPS enforcement and HSTS headers for all deployed environments.
note: Added HSTS headers and configurable HTTPS enforcement controlled via env-driven config.

text: Input sanitization and output escaping to mitigate injection risks.
note: Input sanitization middleware cleans body/query/params.

text: CSRF protection for browser-based consumers.
note: Added double-submit CSRF token cookie and header validation for unsafe methods.

text: Secure cookie settings with SameSite and HttpOnly flags where applicable.
note: Refresh cookies use secure/httpOnly with SameSite based on env.

text: Automated security scanning for dependencies and container images.
Audit logging for changes to sensitive data such as pricing and discounts.
note: Audit logging now captures user context for price-affecting inventory changes.

Configurable PII masking for logs and exports.

Inventory schema that tracks VIN, year, length, weight and chassis details.
note: Inventory schema now tracks VIN, year, length, weight, chassis fields.

text: Support for multiple condition states (new, used, demo, pending sale).
note: Condition limited to new/used/demo/pending_sale.

text: Pricing fields for MSRP, sale price, rebates, taxes and fees.
note: Pricing fields expanded to msrp/salePrice/rebates/taxes/fees with validation.
